author: Fextralife
description:
Elden Ring Nightreign - 15 CHANGES That NEED To Happen
In this Elden Ring Nightreign video, I want to talk about 15 things that I want to see added to Nightreign over the next year or so that could drastically improve this game. There are simply things that I think could make this game even better than it currently is. So watch on find out.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki

Timestamp:

0:34 - 15 Changes Nightreign Needs
10:20 - Final Thoughts
